Comment: Opens / Closes Fileexplorer and Buffermanager
Set focus to Buffermanager
Set the current shown directory in Fileexplorer as working directory
Sets focus to window dependening on the arrow key
increase current window height N lines
decrease current window height N lines
moves current window to the top / bottom
rotates window vertically
Closes the current buffer
Cycles through buffers
Disables highlighting e.g. after a search
Highlights current line
Delete from cursor till end of line
Saves the current opened file
Arranges all columns - ! forces recalculation
Removes all trailing spaces - unarranges columns
Unfolds everything
Shows the current status of the working tree
Commits the status of the working tree
Calls "git add ."
Calls "git push"
Shows the help to a shortcut with CTRL
